name: pixitest
description: * `npm run start` - runs the compiler and a server at the same time in dev mode with HMR (Hot Module Replacement) ðŸ”¥. * `npm run build` - runs the compiler once and generates a production build. * `npm run build_serve` - it makes a build and serves it to port 8080.

scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./
